listitem.para: Output the position of the mouse at the time the last mouse event was generated. The position is given as a two element list: [X, Y]. The mouse must first be turned on by calling MOUSEON.

varlistentry.listitem:
PENUP MOUSEON [SETPOS MOUSEPOS PENDOWN] [PENUP] [] [] [SETPOS MOUSEPOS]
Move the mouse around. Hold down the left button to draw. MOUSEOFF
